page.title: 03THE SCHOOL POND
page.content: One Thursday we made our school pond more presentable and safer.Our teacher put us into groups to do different jobs.Mr Heslop helped us because he lived next to the school pond.One group made a marsh area by dumping top soil into one edge then planting it with marsh plants.Nico Brezan,Nicky Heslop and Jonathan Markland took some of the duckweed off the surface of the pond.While we were doing this ,we scooped two {Great Crested newts}which makes our pond and area of special scientific interest.We all helped to take some of the old fencing and roll it up and put it into a pile.Some people had to move some sticks and branches to put on the pile.When we had a big enough pile of rubbish, leaves and twigs,we burnt them.
